name: CRS Truck Competitior
description: You may have already played the different racing monster truck games but this racing is amazing and interesting. Different hurdles make game more adventure. You as driver ride full speed and avoid to any hurdles otherwise you may be lose this game. In fact this game base of racing.  So get  ready for the thrilling  monster-truck driving missions to perform some acrobatic stunts riding. You can choose your favorite monster truck.You are a risky player and want to this racing win at any cost. You should be brave man like commando. This monster truck racing totally new racing game for all truck Racing and Car Racing and other simulation  fans. Are you ready to drive your monster truck to victory in this amazing adventure game. This grand truck driving game offers thrilling and challenging levels to play and become champ. Multiple levels make game more effective. So lets come and join this game and feedback us throw comment about this game.
